name: A. Sheppard - Samples
tagline: a page to store github project samples
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Page.
This is a site for storing different examples of things I have worked on:


### Help Desk Request Form
This form was created with the intention of being a tool for tier 1 support at a multi-national company. The questions it goes through were compiled from a list of tasks there were being handled by the implementation team.  It was found that more often than not, the same few questions would prevent them from doing the leg-work of validating the basic information needed to start work.

[Help Desk](HelpDeskRequestForm/request_form.htm)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
